destroyOnHide.description: Whether to destroy the node that hides tabs, this property of TabPane takes precedence over Tabs.
destroyOnHide.description_zh: 是否销毁隐藏标签页的节点, TabPane 的该属性优先级高于 Tabs。

editable.description: Whether to add or remove labels. Valid only when type is card or card-gutter.
editable.description_zh: 是否允许增减标签。只在 type 为 card 或 card-gutter 时候生效。

headerPadding.description: Whether there is a horizontal margin in the tab header. This effect applies only to tabs whose type is equal to line or text
headerPadding.description_zh: 选项卡头部是否存在水平边距。仅对 type等于 line、text类型的选项卡生效

justify.description: The height supports the container and only works in horizontal mode. (The default height is propped up.) ）
justify.description_zh: 高度撑满容器，只在水平模式下生效。（默认的高度是又撑起的。）

lazyload.description: When set to true, hidden tabs will not be rendered when the component is mounted.
lazyload.description_zh: 设置为 true 时，将不会在组件挂载的时候渲染被隐藏的标签页。

showAddButton.description: Whether to display the new button (only takes effect when editable is true)
showAddButton.description_zh: 是否显示新增按钮（仅在editable为true时生效）

activeTab.description: The key of the currently selected tab
activeTab.description_zh: 当前选中的 tab 的 key

defaultActiveTab.description: The label tab is selected by default, if not specified by default, the first one is selected
defaultActiveTab.description_zh: 默认选中的标签选项卡，如不指定默认选择第一个

direction.description: The orientation of the label tab is horizontal or vertical, corresponding to horizontal and vertical, respectively. ** Note: Deprecated, use tabPosition instead. **
direction.description_zh: 标签选项卡的方向是水平还是竖直，分别对应 horizontal 和 vertical。** 注意： 已废弃，使用 tabPosition 替代。**

overflow.description: When there are many tabs, choose to display the tab in the form of scrolling/drop-down menus
overflow.description_zh: 标签页较多时候，选择滚动/下拉菜单形式展示 tab

scrollPosition.description: If the scroll position of the tab is selected, the default auto will scroll the activeTab to the visible area, but will not make any special position adjustments
scrollPosition.description_zh: 被选中 tab 的滚动位置，默认 auto 即会将 activeTab 滚动到可见区域，但不会特意做位置调整

size.description: There are four sizes to choose from, which are mini, small, default, large
size.description_zh: 有四个尺寸供选择，分别为mini, small, default, large

type.type: line / card / card-gutter / text / rounded / capsule

:extra.description: Displayed on the right side of the tab
:extra.description_zh: 显示在标签页右侧的附加

animation.description: Whether to turn on transition effects

:icons.description: The tab header Edit/Scroll/Drop icon is configured. For icons that you don't want to display, you can set them to null
:icons.description_zh: 标签页头部 编辑/滚动/下拉 图标配置。对于不想展示的图标可以将其设置为null

:scrollAfterEdit.description: Whether to automatically scroll after the tag is added or removed (takes effect when editable is true)
:scrollAfterEdit.description_zh: 是否在标签增减后，自动进行滚动调整(editable为true时生效）

:renderTabTitle.type: (tabTitle: ReactNode,info: {key: string | number;isActive: boolean;disabled: boolean;editable: boolean;}) => ReactNode
:renderTabTitle.description_zh: 自定义单个选项卡头部

events.name: onAddTab
events.description: Click the callback to add the tab button
events.description_zh: 点击新增 tab 按钮的回调

events.name: onClickTab
events.description: Click on the callback of the tab

events.name: onDeleteTab
events.description: Click the callback of the delete button
